CHAT.comment: INV uncovers the computer box.
child opens his eyes.
child turns and looks around the room.
child goes toward the covered starfish tank.
child comes back to computer box and touches it.
child points to something on the computer box.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom refers to the cloth on the floor near the child's feet.
child brings chair over to the computer box.
child refers to the sound coming from the starfish tank.
child walks over to starfish tank.
child goes back to computer box.
child gets up and opens the door.
child shuts the door.
computer box beeps.
INV brings in the car.
INV covers computer box.
child points to piston on the back of the car.
child goes over to starfish tank.
mom tries to direct child's attention back to car.
child moves chairs around.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child puts car on the table.
child walks away from car and sits down.
child rolls car around on the table.
mom and child leave the room to go to the bathroom.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom and child push car back and forth.
child laughs.
child sees red light from video camera.
mom tries to direct child's attention back to the car.
mom and child push car back and forth on the table.
child gets up and goes over to the couch.
mom pushes car across the floor.
child kicks car.
INV and child's brother comes into the room.
INV hands the meerkat to the mom and child's little brother falls.
INV takes car out of the room.
child pets meerkat and hands him back to mom.
child gives meerkat a hug.
child stands up on the couch.
mom gives the meerkat to the child.
child points to the ears.
child points to meerkat's eyes.
child points to meerkat's nose.
child passes gas.
child is examining the heater.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
it is unclear what child is referring to, but either the heater or the meerkat.
child gives mom a hug.
child brings meerkat over to the couch.
mom moves meerkat's arms and makes it dance.
mom makes meerkat clap it's hands.
child touches covered computer box.
child hits himself in the head.
child gets up and pulls on meerkat's tail.
child hears his brother in the hallway.
mom pretends meerkat is making barking noises at the child.
child tries to open the door.
INV tries to come into the room but child is in front of the door.
child's brother drops car.
INV and child uncover starfish tank.
INV leaves the room.
child's brother tries to do something he's not supposed to.
mom pulls child's brother onto her lap and he starts screaming.
mom speaks to child's brother.
mom speaks to child's brother who tries to get to the plug again.
mom talks to child's brother.
mom talks to child's brother.
child points at the tank.
child looks down at the cloth on the floor.
child's brother brings cloth to mom.
mom talks to the child.
mom speaks to child's brother.
child refers to the outlet with the tank plugged in it.
mom speaks to child's brother.
INV talks to child's brother.
INV talks to mom and child.
mom covers up starfish tank.
INV brings in the degu.
child refers to the plug on the starfish tank.
INV leaves the room.
mom puts her finger on top of the cage and degu comes up to it.
child moves the part of the cage that holds the water bottle.
child drops it against the top of the cage.
child points to the top of the cage.
INV comes into the room with child's brother.
child's brother uncovers starfish tank.
INV speaks to child's brother.
INV speaks to child.
INV leaves the room with child's brother.
child puts his finger on top of the cage and when the degu moves toward him he pulls it away.
child shakes cage.
child speaks to the degu.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child looks at covered starfish tank.
child points at the top of the cage.
child tries to pull the handle out.
mom rotates the cage around and utters something unintelligible.
child taps on the cage.
child accidentally punches mom in the face.
mom and child laugh.
child shakes the cage.
child hits mom in the face again.
child kisses mom on the cheek.
child refers to the sound the starfish tank is making.
INV removes degu from the room.
child's brother whines and follows INV out into the hall..
child and mom leave the room.
child and mom come back into the room.
child pulls chair back and it starts to fall.
INV brings Robodog into the room.
child walks over to Robodog and presses buttons.
Robodog starts moving again.
child lifts up Roboodog and brings it over to mom on the couch.
child tries to press buttons on the robodog.
Robodog makes an odd clicking noise.
child talks to robodog.
child talks to robodog.
robodog sits on its back legs.
mom puts her finger in robodog's mouth.
child examines robodog's mouth silently.
robodog makes a noise.
INV comes into the room with child's brother.
mom and INV utter something unintelligible at the same time.
mom talks to child's brother.
INV removes robodog from the room.
